definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rub (NH id.; Aram. (Talm.) [[מְרַח]]; cf. Ar. maraxa anoint, smear);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִשְׂאוּ דְּבֶלֶת תְּאֵנִים וְיִמְרְחוּ עַל־הַשְּׁחִין]] Is 38:21 let them take a cake of figs and rub it upon the eruption ([[שִׂים]] in ‖ 2Ki 20:7).—On [[מרוח]] v. supr.
